venue.address_1: Between Church, Elm, Temple and Chapel streets
venue.name: Lower New Haven Green

item.description:
i hope you'll join me for New Haven's first official free concert on the Green this season. "Los Lonely Boys" are putting on a show, and i have a feeling it's going to be a good one.

bring a blanket, bring a chair, bring some beer, bring some wine, bring some cheese, bring whatever makes you happy. i'll be traveling light myself (though with some wine and beer to share), since the concert ends at 7:30 and i'll be looking for something to do afterwards -- post party? bring ideas. we'll figure it out.

i'll be getting there around five to find a good seat. feel free to give me a call to find out where exactly i am. i'll tell you right now where i won't be: sitting underneath a tree. after all, i wouldn't want to compress its roots or anything.

your contact: ben (203) 554-5144
item.name: Sat. 7/14 - Concert on the Green: Los Lonely Boys
